gameInfo.title: Title
gameInfo.revolvingDoor: This is a revolving door game
gameInfo.revolvingDoorDescription: You can join this game at any time if there are free seats

agreePrivacyPolicy: I agree to the privacy policy
privacyPolicyText:
Role playing signup system is implemented by Arttu Hanska (email arttu.hanska@gmail.com). The system is governed by US law. The following information about game registrations is stored in the system. Personally identifiable information is removed from the system after the event, but non-personally identifiable information may be published for statistical purposes.
Information to be saved:
- A unique user ID of your choice
- Username password hash
- Information about user-selected games: favorites, sign-ups, games where the user is assigned
- Other users with whom the user has formed a group
https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/gdpr-center/
registrationSerialHelp: Get registration code from RPG desk
signupOpen: Signup open for the following times
activeTimeDescription: Game assignment will be done and results shown for the active time
signupGuide:
* You can choose three game wishes. Your favorite game is the topmost on 'Selected games'.
* It is recommended to choose more than one game wish for each start time.
* Choose games by dragging from 'Open games' to 'Selected games'.
* Signing up early does not give any advantage. Game seats are assigned 30 minutes before games start.
* Remember to save changes.
signupResultHint: Sign up results are visible on 'My Games' page at
closingMessage: Konsti is closed and will open closer to the next event
noLotterySignupResult: You didn't get into a game during lottery
invalidGameId: Game not found. Invalid game ID
feedbackInstruction: Did you enjoy the game? Send feedback to the game master! They will receive it after the event.
revolvingDoorInstruction: You can join revolving door games at any time if there are free seats in the table

error.removePreviousSignupsFailed: Error deleting previous signups, try again
error.onlyCreatorCanCloseGroup: Only group creator can close group
error.userHasSignedGames: You already have entered games. Cancel those games before joining group.

group.signupForWholeGroup: You are group creator. You can sign up to games for the whole group.
group.inGroupSignups: You are in a group. Following games are chosen by the group creator.
group.closeGroupConfirmation: Are you sure you want to close group and remove all its members?
group.groupTooBigWarning: Group is bigger than the maximum number of players
group.createGroupConfirmationMessage: Do you want to create a group?
group.groupMemberInfo: Group creator will sign up to the games for the whole group. See selected games from "My Games" page.
group.groupCreatorInfo: You can sign up to games for the whole group. Please make sure that the group is not too big for the selected games. Group creator cannot leave the group, but can close it. This will remove all members from the group.
group.joiningGroupWillCancelGames: Joining a group will cancel all signups you may have done before
group.groupLotterySignupGuide: Group can signup to same games for lottery.
group.groupSignupGuide: You can join group with group starter's registration code. Your own code is:
group.groupLotterySignupTabletopOnly: Only tabletop RPGs support lottery signup.

errorMessage: We have recognised an issue that 'Signup results' under 'My Games' may be shown incorrectly and are now hidden. Please see 'All Signup Results' page for correct information.

signup.cannotSignupMoreThanOneGame: You cannot sign up to other games starting at the same time.
signup.inGroupWarning: If you signup to game you will be removed from group you are in
signup.groupCreatorWarning: If you signup to game the group you created will be destroyed

accessibility.irritateSkin: Materials or substances that irritate the skin
accessibility.physicalContact: Physical contact and/or low chances of personal space
accessibility.movingAround: Participation involves a lot of moving around without a chance for sitting down
accessibility.video: The game involves watching a video without subtitles for the hearing impaired
accessibility.recording: Participation requires listening to a recording that does not have a text version for the hearing impaired
accessibility.text: Participation involves reading long texts independently, and the texts are not available as recordings for those with visual impairment
accessibility.colourblind: Material used in the game can cause problems for the colourblind
accessibility.remainingOnePlace: Requires staying still for a long time without possibility of breaks or movement
